title: battlecast alpha skarner voicelines being replaced by standard skarner voicelines
body:
i don't have a video or anything so if someone could get one that'd be cool

it's "the crystal scar is weeping", "we think alike summoner", "on all legs", and some other one i couldn't really make out
i hope you guys fix this soon

replies.body:
Hey Obliviongate20 - 

Thanks for the report! No need to grab a video - we're aware of skins that don't use the base VO normally are having issues playing the proper lines. We're currently working on a fix!
